title: Peas, Yes; Pineapples, No: D.C.’s Local Produce Scene, Explored
description: What does it mean to "buy seasonal" in the D.C. area? A listener seeks a guide to the region's local produce, and to answer, reporter Esther Ciammachilli takes us on a tour of the region’s agricultural economy, from a Virginia farm to a D.C. restaurant that uses only ingredients they can buy directly from farmers. If you LOVE What's With Washington, become a member! Head to wamu.org/donate to support the show and more great podcasts from WAMU. To submit a question, visit wamu.org/whatswith.
